snippet: A lawyer for Kweku M. Adoboli, a former UBS trader in London, said that the allegations against his client represented a "character assassination" that failed to highlight the role of UBS's management in condoning his trading activity.
abstract: A lawyer for Kweku M. Adoboli, a former UBS trader in London, said that the allegations against his client represented a "character assassination" that failed to highlight the role of UBS's management in condoning his trading activity.

headline.main: Adoboli, Ex-UBS Trader, Called Scapegoat for Bank's Woes
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Says Ex-UBS Trader Is Scapegoat for Bank Woes
